message.body: I just thought of something that I want to text you before I forget: my roommate's boyfriend left his coffee shop job and is looking for a new one. If you are looking to get rid of your hours this might be perfect for him
Awesome I'll keep him in mind except to be honest- there are like ten people fighting for my job already
All art school u of arts girls
But if something opens up I'll let him know
Okay sounds good. BUT you should know: this guy like took a class on being a barista and wants to eventually run a coffee shop haha
That might be a game changer for you
Oh also, there's a Vox Populi show tonight
I saw , when would you want to head over? I might be able to go
I always like to show up right in the middle, so I'll probably leave my house around 8? Maybe 7:30 since I'm in south Philly
If you can only come later though, I can do that too
Ok yeah I'll be later
How long are you planning on staying? Like only 30 mins?
Meet you there at 8:30?
I can give you ride home but I don't plan on staying long so it's your call
Nvm I'll take the ride haha
Oh haha no more than that!
No, more than that I mean haha not 'no more than' texting yikes
I'm running very late so I'll probably be there by 8:45
Let me pick you up from station - where would you get off?
Race vine station, it's on broad
I'm reaching in about 3-4 mins
See you there
